headline20: Critical operational constraints are flagged at 7 airports right now.
management45: Critical operational constraints are flagged at 7 airports right now. Across base airports: 2 critical, 11 high, 23 medium, 3 normal. Base airports needing attention include Copernicus Wrocław (WRO/EPWR), Chişinău (RMO/LUKK), Iaşi (IAS/LRIA), Katowice Wojciech Korfanty (KTW/EPKT) and Budapest Liszt Ferenc (BUD/LHBP) and 8 others. Other base airports are mostly medium severity and should be monitored (23 flagged). At base airports, the main issues are snow and runway contamination risk at Poznań-Ławica (POZ/EPPO), Chişinău (RMO/LUKK), Václav Havel Airport Prague (PRG/LKPR) and Kraków John Paul II (KRK/EPKK) and 1 others, mist at Poznań-Ławica (POZ/EPPO), Chişinău (RMO/LUKK), Václav Havel Airport Prague (PRG/LKPR) and Kraków John Paul II (KRK/EPKK) and 8 others, and low cloud base at Poznań-Ławica (POZ/EPPO), Chişinău (RMO/LUKK), Václav Havel Airport Prague (PRG/LKPR) and Kraków John Paul II (KRK/EPKK) and 8 others. Across the network, the worst‑affected airports include Berlin Brandenburg Willy Brandt (BER/EDDB), Hamburg Helmut Schmidt (HAM/EDDH), Frankfurt-Hahn (HHN/EDFH), Lennart Meri Tallinn (TLL/EETN), Poznań-Ławica (POZ/EPPO), Bacău George Enescu (BCM/LRBC) and 1 others. Primary drivers are cold‑temperature performance penalties, low cloud base and mist. Expected impact: reduced runway capacity and higher delay/diversion risk at the worst‑affected airports, especially where visibility/RVR and cloud base are very low. Since the last update, 12 airports changed status, led by Berlin Brandenburg Willy Brandt (BER/EDDB), Hamburg Helmut Schmidt (HAM/EDDH), Frankfurt-Hahn (HHN/EDFH), Lennart Meri Tallinn (TLL/EETN), Poznań-Ławica (POZ/EPPO), Bacău George Enescu (BCM/LRBC) and 6 others.
detail90: Critical operational constraints are flagged at 7 airports right now. Base airports (focus): Copernicus Wrocław (WRO/EPWR) — HIGH: mist; runway contamination risk; cold-temperature performance penalties | Chişinău (RMO/LUKK) — HIGH: mist; runway contamination risk; strong gusts risk | Iaşi (IAS/LRIA) — HIGH: mist; cloud base around 200 ft | Katowice Wojciech Korfanty (KTW/EPKT) — HIGH: mist; cold-temperature performance penalties; cloud base around 400 ft | Budapest Liszt Ferenc (BUD/LHBP) — HIGH: mist; cloud base around 200 ft | Kraków John Paul II (KRK/EPKK) — HIGH: freezing fog; runway contamination risk; cold-temperature performance penalties and 7 others. Worst affected now: Berlin Brandenburg Willy Brandt (BER/EDDB) — CRIT: snow; runway contamination risk; cold-temperature performance penalties (drivers: runway contamination / reduced braking, cold-temperature performance penalties, low ceilings) | Hamburg Helmut Schmidt (HAM/EDDH) — CRIT: mist; snow; runway contamination risk (drivers: runway contamination / reduced braking, cold-temperature performance penalties, low ceilings) | Frankfurt-Hahn (HHN/EDFH) — CRIT: mist; cold-temperature performance penalties; visibility down to 2.9 km, RVR down to 500 m, cloud base around 100 ft (drivers: low-visibility takeoff restrictions, cold-temperature performance penalties, runway visual range (RVR) constraints) | Lennart Meri Tallinn (TLL/EETN) — CRIT: mist; snow; cold-temperature performance penalties (drivers: cold-temperature performance penalties, low ceilings, mist) | Poznań-Ławica (POZ/EPPO) — CRIT: mist; snow; runway contamination risk (drivers: approach minima limits, runway contamination / reduced braking, cold-temperature performance penalties) | Bacău George Enescu (BCM/LRBC) — CRIT: fog; visibility down to 800 m, cloud base around 100 ft; below approach minima (current METAR) (drivers: approach minima limits, very low visibility, low ceilings) and 1 others. Changed since last run: Berlin Brandenburg Willy Brandt (BER/EDDB), Hamburg Helmut Schmidt (HAM/EDDH), Frankfurt-Hahn (HHN/EDFH), Lennart Meri Tallinn (TLL/EETN), Poznań-Ławica (POZ/EPPO), Bacău George Enescu (BCM/LRBC), David the Builder Kutaisi (KUT/UGKO), Almaty (ALA/UAAA), Memmingen Allgau (FMM/EDJA), Turku (TKU/EFTU) and 2 others.
